author: Natasha Bertrand
title: China-linked ‘Electric Panda’ hackers seek U.S. targets, intel agency warns
description: The warning comes as tensions rise between the U.S. and China over the spread of Covid-19.
content: Cleared contractor facilities often receive warnings about hacking attempts from the FBI and DCSA, but the notices rarely attribute the malicious activity to a specific group or nation-state as the DCSA did with Electric Panda, one employee at a firm that con… [+3468 chars]
